divs: Sighting DetailsMy son(13yrs) and husband(33yrs)saw a fast moving orange star like object move across the sky last night while sitting in our hot tub star gazing. I believe from thier description it was going from northwest to south. They have seen satelights before, but my husband said this was not a satelight. I'm reporting this on their behalf. I did not see it last night, but last summer we saw a bunch of them. I have reported most of our sightings. My son always yells to me from our back door to tell me that there is another ufo that they can see. We have a very large obstructed view of the sky, so I think that's what helps us see so many.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in West Jordan
There were no other sightings in West Jordan on or around January 29th 2009
Summary: Saw fast moving orange star move across the sky
